forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 21C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High around 70F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low near 55F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny. High 22C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 71F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 19C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High near 65F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 16C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 60F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the evening. Low 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain ending overnight. Low near 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 19C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High near 65F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 53F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 18C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 63F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later at night. Low around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
